job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware EngineerstrongppSalary Range 75000  90000ppbrppIn Time Tec a global software solutions company based in Meridian Idaho is hiring a fulltime Software Engineer Founded in 2009 In Time Tec is committed to creating abundance for our partners employees stakeholders and the community We partner with clients often working onsite in their offices to explore and understand business requirements to deliver longterm custom software services We are recognized as one of Inc 5000s fastestgrowing privatelyheld companies and have been named as one of the Best Places to Work in Idaho for five consecutive yearsppbrppIn Time Tec offers competitive compensation healthvisiondental benefits 401k FSAs tenurebased paid time off and countless personal and professional development opportunitiesppbrppstrongAre You a FitstrongppThose who thrive at In Time Tec are focused first and foremost on people and making a difference for others They are committed to and have a passion for learning their craft and developing themselves as leaders Competency to deliver and perform is required Work is seen as a vehicle to create abundance for our partners teams families and communityppThose who need predictability clearly defined roadmaps consistent direction and a set schedule may find In Time Tecs work environment challengingppIf you are considering joining In Time Tec we strongly encourage you to read our blog posts listen to our podcasts read reviews etc to get a better sense of who we areppPlease explore the resources provided  EngineerstrongppThe Software Engineer is an experienced software engineer responsible for leading the software development effort of large scale software systems with a global teamnbspIn this role the Software Engineer brings their experience and capabilities to a project and shows up for the In Time Tec and partner teams to deliver valuenbspAs a Software Engineer you must show up to listen to the needs of the team and partner learn what is required from you and the team and show up committed to delivering against the needs of the projectppbrppstrongRequiredstrongppOur industry is changing constantly and as a software services provider our partners technical needs and business objectives are everevolving As a result of our commitment to create abundance our teams do what needs to be done as a possibility In the process it is expected that each team member learns unlearns and relearns how to best create value in any given role project and partnership The ability to adapt technically learn through practical application and to have a willingness to utilize available resources in the process requires technical aptitude and a commitment to be a part of something bigger than yourself To fulfill this requirement a candidate must be open othersfocused and inspired to make a difference through their contributionppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppAs a Software Engineer you will be working with the partner to understand business requirements breaking down requirements into work items designing technical solutions coordinating delivery and delivering on assigned requirementsnbspThe Software Engineer ensures development processes are in place to deliver with quality and identifies areas of improvements and training needs for the software development team with regard to technologies and the context for specific projectsnbspAs the partnership progresses and grows youll work with the leadership team to measure progress provide input on the direction and team composition and lead change to effectively deliver on evolving client needsnbspYou are responsible for reaching out to senior technologists for coaching and mentoring and will look for opportunities to grow lessexperienced engineers on the project and at In Time TecpulliMeet and collaborate with our development teams in India as needed based on project requirementsliliParticipate in weekly technical and leadership development learning groupslili80 of time focused on partner project and 20 of time with In Time TecliulpnbspppstrongSoft SkillsstrongpulliAbility to listen and learnliliClear kind and candid languages capabilities and supporting librariesliliAdditional knowledge and experience with at least two additional programming languagesliliOpenness and capability to learn and adapt to other programming languages and design paradigms required based on project needsliliProficiency with at least one major cloud computing environment such as AWS or AzureliliProficiency with at least one web framework such as ASPNET Spring or other frameworkliliExperience developing large scale web application systems across the full stack utilizing containers in a CICD pipelineliliProficient at writing unit tests and knowledgeable on automated API and system testsliliExperience with Relational and NoSQL databasesliliKnowledge and ability to discuss software principles such as ObjectOriented Programming or SOLID and design patterns such as MVC and classic ObjectOriented design patterns such as the Factory pattern and Decorator patternliliSolid demonstrable knowledge and experience in a version control system such as GIT including branching merging and conflict resolutionliliExpert level at debugging software issues and experience triaging issues in production environmentsliliExperience in DevOps and experience writing automated tests a plusliliUnderstanding of software security best practicesliliExperience and capability to conduct design and code reviews creating actionable feedback that improves the quality of delivered code and grows other developers on the teamliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBachelors Degree in Computer Science Computer
